unit: Unit 4 | Probability, Random Variables, and Probability Distributions
title: Family Game Night Probability
question_text: Itâ€™s family game night in Cocoa Beach. Residents settle in to play their favorite game and eat their favorite snack. A random sample of $115\text{ families}$ were asked their preferred game and snack, and the results are presented in the two-way table below. Pizza Rolls Chips and Dip Cookies Yahtzee 10 3 12 Trivial Pursuit 8 14 7 Monopoly 14 17 7 Wii Bowling 12 7 4 What is the probability of being neither a Yahtzee enthusiast nor one who prefers chips and dip?
